article_text: Peggy Noonan writes that Republican presidential candidates offering prayers for the shooting victims of San Bernardino “managed to enrage the progressive left.” This included bloggers, reporters and also Sen. Chris Murphy (D., Conn.), who sent out “the most manipulative message of recent political history.” Ms. Noonan quotes Mr. Murphy: “Your ‘thoughts’ should be about steps to take to stop this carnage. Your ‘prayers’ should be for forgiveness if you do nothing—again.” Ms. Noonan suspects “part of the problem is that a number...

Peggy Noonan writes that Republican presidential candidates offering prayers for the shooting victims of San Bernardino “managed to enrage the progressive left.” This included bloggers, reporters and also Sen. Chris Murphy (D., Conn.), who sent out “the most manipulative message of recent political history.” Ms. Noonan quotes Mr. Murphy: “Your ‘thoughts’ should be about steps to take to stop this carnage.
